description: A girl wrapped in bandages, leaving only her eyes and mouth exposed.

npcTexts: Three years… I came in winter, so cold.
I still feel that chill cutting into my skin.
My skin is thin. Even sunlight burns me.
Doctor said keep wrapped, or I wouldn’t survive.
My cousin sometimes sends gifts.
Kind of her, though I can’t show her my face.
Just to see myself in the mirror… not a monster.
I’ve lived with this disease since childhood.
Thanks for listening. Few have such patience.
Ah… maybe only two years.
Time inside these walls always feels endless.
Maybe… early spring is still cold.
I just misremembered, please don’t think much of it.
A handkerchief. I keep it in the drawer.
I like it, but my skin won’t let me wear it.
I think my skin feels a little better.
But sunlight could still burn me badly.
Goodbye.
Two and a half years… I keep miscounting.
Here, each day feels like a year.
In the drawer beside my bed.
Ah… last time I said wooden box, didn’t I?
Sorry, my memory is poor.
Yes.
Not sure why my skin improved today.
Doctor even let me unwrap my head. Maybe I’m not as sick as I thought.
Not yet, only you. I’ll call my sister tomorrow.
Others might not believe I was ever sick.
Come again tomorrow if you’d like <3
Three years. Yes… I think it’s right this time.
But if I’m wrong again… not surprising, is it?
In the drawer beside my bed.
Ah… last time I said wooden box, didn’t I?
Sorry, my memory is poor.
Today, I feel more beautiful than ever.
But sometimes I fear… this beauty isn’t mine.
Tomorrow, I want to go out for a walk.
To see how others look at me… will they recognize me?
Will you come with me?
See you tomorrow.
